topics.body:
I figured out why /a/ dislikes the kill la kill fanbase

[spoiler]Is there an anime character stronger than Matoi Ryuko?

And I’m not talking about Tenkousei Ryuuko. I’m talking about Senketsu Kisaragi Matoi Ryuko with the Seki Tekko and with both Senjin and Shippu forms and the Sen-i-Soshitsu technique, the perfected Tachikiri Basami and the power of all Honnouji Gakuen's Goku Seifuku and Kamui Junketsu, with Shinra Koketsu's Seimei Sen'i implanted in her so she can also perform seishin karinui and zettai fukuju.[/spoiler]

topics.body:
Random post:
You know I think I just realized why the western anime industry failed super hard: gross incompetence.

A couple years back there were attempts at creating anime in the USA, but the companies involved didn't know what the fuck they were doing or why people like anime.
